alert.note: Alert for Brunswick; Dinwiddie; Greensville; Lunenburg; Nottoway; Sussex (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 26 at 11:54PM EDT until June 27 at 3:00AM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 AM EDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL GREENSVILLE...SOUTHEASTERN LUNENBURG...SOUTHEASTERN NOTTOWAY...WEST CENTRAL SUSSEX...SOUTHERN DINWIDDIE AND NORTHERN BRUNSWICK COUNTIES... At 1154 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near McKenney, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. This severe storm will be near... McKenney around 1205 AM EDT. Dewitt around 1210 AM EDT. Dinwiddie around 1220 AM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Bacons Fork, Cochran, Irby, Gills Corner, Rawlings, Dolphin, Barrows Store, Murdocks, Forkland and Warfield. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Brunswick; Dinwiddie; Greensville; Lunenburg; Nottoway; Sussex
